title: What are some ways to host a web design portfolio free of cost? - Quora

response.answer_text: Web design portfolio? Hmm… Do you need a dynamic website? If not then the most awesome place would be GitHub Pages You can host your static website for free. GitHub has almost Zero downtime. Having a github link like http://username.github.io could only help your credibility, though you can also use your custom domain name to your website.

You can use Free Blogging Services like Blogger.com - Create a unique and beautiful blog. It’s easy and free. . It is very easy to work with. You will get free domain like “http://xyz.blogspot.com “ and it has a free self hosting so you dont have to buy any hosting plan and you will also have option to add custom domain in future if want to do so.
